title: Implement Update() for window resize handling
description:
Handle tea.WindowSizeMsg in Update():

On resize:
1. Store new dimensions: m.width, m.height = msg.Width, msg.Height
2. Calculate pane dimensions:
   - statusHeight = 3 (or 4 with progress bar)
   - footerHeight = 1
   - mainHeight = height - statusHeight - footerHeight
   - taskPaneWidth = 35
   - outputPaneWidth = width - taskPaneWidth - 3 (borders)
   - contentHeight = mainHeight - 2 (borders)

3. Update viewport dimensions:
   m.viewport.Width = outputPaneWidth - 2 (padding)
   m.viewport.Height = contentHeight

4. Set m.ready = true on first resize
5. Re-render viewport content if needed

Handle edge cases:
- Minimum width: 60 chars
- Minimum height: 10 rows
- Clamp dimensions if below minimum
closed_reason: Added minimum dimension constants (minWidth=60, minHeight=10) and updated Update() WindowSizeMsg handler to clamp dimensions to minimums before calculating layout. Existing updateViewportSize() already properly calculates pane dimensions. TUI package compiles independently.
